metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17122 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The dump_relocs_in_section function in objdump.c in GNU Binutils 2.29.1does not check for reloc count integer overflows, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (excessive memory allocation, orheap-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted PE file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
